story.translation: Meet my friends and say goodbye to them.
Yesterday, I made a new friend at school.

story.sentence: **그 친구는 매우 재미있었고, 함께 **한국어를 연습하기도 합니다. **
story.translation: That friend was very fun and we also practice Korean together.
That friend helped me while I was learning Korean.

lesson_focus.cultural_notes: In Korea, greetings are an essential part of the culture. It is important to use appropriate levels of formality when speaking.
